Title: Idle Zoo World
SubTitle: Published by Supersonic from Unity
Description:
Idle Resource Management Game, where players can build and manage their own zoo.
Attracting visitors and earning money to expand their collection of animals and facilities.

Title: Hidden Match World
SubTitle: Published by Supersonic from Unity
Description: Hidden Object Puzzle Game, where players search for hidden objects in levels. Main Match mechanic is taken from Zen Match.

Title: Spaceship Defense TD
SubTitle: Published by Supersonic from Unity
Description: Tower Defense Game, where player chooses towers and upgrades for his ship and defends against waves of enemies.

Title: Miasma
Description:
2.5D Sidescroller Lovecraftian Horror Game, where player is playing as a Marie - a young daughter of captain of a ship lost at sea. 
The ship is caught in a terrible storm and Marie finds herself alone on the deck, surrounded by darkness and the howling wind. As she tries to find her way back to safety, she begins to experience strange and terrifying visions that blur the line between reality and nightmare.

Title: Chefhero
Description: 2D Bullet Heaven Sidecroller, where player is playing as a Chef, who is trying to save his restaurant from the invasion of food monsters. Armed with a variety of kitchen utensils and cooking tools, the Chef must navigate through a series of increasingly challenging levels, battling waves of food monsters and bosses along the way. As the Chef progresses through the game, he can collect power-ups and upgrades to enhance his abilities and weapons, making him more effective against the food monsters.

Title: Horde Switch
SubTitle: Powered by Photon Fusion
Description: 3D Multiplayer Card Game, where players are constantly trying to survive against enemies and outlive the opponent

Title: Dead Lift
SubTitle: Jam Game
Description: Local Multiplayer game about getting at the highest point of a zombie tower
